response.overview: An Argentine woman and two Venezuelans climb Uritorco Hill in search of an electronic music party. On the way up, one of them gets lost. The days pass alongside a crafts vendor turned hippie, an elderly woman leaving an offering at the summit, a group of esotericists celebrating a nudist ritual, and among them all, an ET disguised as a human, voyeuristically recording these moments. Finally, signs of their lost friend bring them back to a reality where the party has not stopped beating behind their eyes.
response.title: Uritorco
